Minute Entry for proceedings held before US Magistrate Judge Camille L. Velez- Rive:Initial Appearance as to Garrick Pomales-Soto held on 2/11/2011. Present were AUSA Vernon Miles, AFPD Yasmin Irizarry and PTO Nancy Mendez. Defendant was provided with copy of the indictment and advised as to the charges and his rights. After reviewing the CJA-23 form filled by defendant and since he had been previously represented by the FPDs Office, the Court appointed them to continue representing defendant in these proceedings. AFPD Irizarry brought to the Courts attention an alleged incident between defendant and the arresting officers, which resulted in some injuries to the defendant, who in her view, needed immediate medical attention. Defense counsel was provided with the names of the three (3) intervening DEA and TFA agents. Defendant was observed limping, with limited movement in his neck and with difficulty to stand. However, defendant was alert and competent to understand the proceedings pursuant to the assertions of defense counsel. After consulting with the Government and with the USM, the Court placed defendant under the custody of DEA agent Alemn and TFA Loubriel so that he be provided immediate medical attention. Any video or audio recordings of the alleged incident are to be preserved as requested by defense counsel. Arraignment/Detention set for 2/16/2011 at 09:00 AM in Courtroom 11 before US Magistrate Judge Camille L. Velez-Rive. Defendant is ordered detained pending hearing. (yr) (Entered: 02/14/2011)
